price: Keeyyattoota Rabbii keessatti warra kafaran malee eenyulleen hin falmu. Dachii keessa gara gaggaluun isaanii si hin dagin.
arabic: مَا يُجَٰدِلُ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَلَا يَغۡرُرۡكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā yujādilu fī āyāti al-lahi illā alladhīna kafarū falā yaghrur'ka taqallubuhum fī al-bilādi
